title: Metal Tracker
description: A script that scrapes websites for metal concert info in Barcelona and sends daily email updates. Runs on a Linux server with SQLite for tracking sent emails. I'm particularly proud of the integration testing suite!

title: Dotfiles
description: My personal setup for all my development environments. Includes Zsh, custom functions, and backup scripts. Because why not automate everything?

title: Code Notes
description: A curated collection of programming insights and practical tips. It's my go-to for remembering terminal commands and best practices. Built with MkDocs.

title: Portfolio
description: You're looking at it! My personal portfolio to showcase projects. Built from scratch using Go and minimal HTML/CSS. It's all about keeping things simple and effective!
